default_summary.markdown_formatted:
## Meeting Purpose
Discuss partnership strategies and NetSuite integration for Ampersand, leveraging Kristy McCown's experience at Tropic.

## Key Takeaways
- NetSuite partnership requires a strong business case, focusing on customer acquisition/retention and non-competitive positioning
- Partnerships are critical for Ampersand's product strategy, requiring a skilled hire with product partnerships background
- Kristy offered potential fractional advisory role to help kickstart Ampersand's partnership efforts, particularly with NetSuite

## Topics

### NetSuite Partnership Strategy
- Connect with right team: partnerships team and app ecosystem management
- Build business case: focus on new customer acquisition or retention for NetSuite
- Highlight potential as NetSuite SuiteWorld sponsor ($30k+ investment)
- Avoid competitive positioning with NetSuite's existing modules
- Consider NetSuite purchase ($50k) as leverage for partnership, but don't lead with this

### Partnerships Team Structure
- Hire someone with product partnerships background (5-10 years experience)
- Focus on candidates who have built partnerships, not just managed existing ones
- Look for ability to build business cases and pitch effectively
- Senior manager level likely sufficient; prioritize skills over years of experience

### Ampersand's Integration Strategy
- Position as enterprise integration layer for complex, custom integrations
- Target both new AI/SaaS companies and existing businesses updating their tech stack
- Focus on bidirectional sync capabilities crucial for AI-driven applications
- Potential to replace expensive, inefficient dev shop solutions for major companies

### Potential Advisory Relationship
- Kristy offered fractional advisory role (e.g., 10 hours/week for 6 months)
- Could help initiate partnerships, build business cases, and eventually hire full-time person
- Pricing based on fixed monthly fee; suggested 2-3 month trial period

## Next Steps
- Ayan to add Kristy to Slack channel for async communication
- Schedule follow-up meeting with Ayan's co-founder/CTO to discuss specific requirements
- Kristy to research Ampersand further and prepare potential questions
- Explore advisory relationship terms, focusing on accelerating pre-Series A partnerships

action_items.description: Introduce Ayan to Felipe on LinkedIn re NetSuite partnership
Check network for SAP contacts, share with Ayan if found
Add Kristy to Ampersand Slack channel for async comms + scheduling
Research Ampersand website, use cases; Slack Ayan w/ questions
